definitions.definition: The act of making one unconscious , or at least unable to come back on one's feet within a certain period of time; a TKO .
examples: The boxer scored a knockout on his opponent.

definitions.definition: Something wildly popular , entertaining , or funny .
examples: If you've ever had a sack race, you know it's a real knockout for kids and adults alike.

definitions.definition: A very attractive person, especially a beautiful woman .
A partially punched opening meant for optional later removal.
examples: They left a knockout in the panel for running extra wires someday.

definitions.definition: The deactivation of a particular gene .
A creature engineered with a particular gene deactivated.
An event where a foreground color causes a background color not to print.
A tournament in which a team or player must beat the opponent in order to progress to the next round .
examples: the knockout stages of the competition

definitions.definition: A simple game for two or more players, derived from basketball .

main_definition: The act of making one unconscious , or at least unable to come back on one's feet within a certain period of time; a TKO .
secondary_definitions: ( informal ) Something wildly popular , entertaining , or funny .
( informal ) A very attractive person, especially a beautiful woman .
A partially punched opening meant for optional later removal.
( genetics ) The deactivation of a particular gene .
( genetics ) A creature engineered with a particular gene deactivated.
( printing ) An event where a foreground color causes a background color not to print.
( sports ) A tournament in which a team or player must beat the opponent in order to progress to the next round .
( uncountable ) A simple game for two or more players, derived from basketball .
